statements: SELECT * FROM expenses_and_income WHERE type = 'expense' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM expenses_and_income WHERE type = 'income';
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_income WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM expenses_and_income WHERE type = 'expense' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT category, amount, type FROM expenses_and_income WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_income WHERE type = 'expense' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses_and_income WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_income WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND type = 'income' ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses_and_income WHERE type = 'expense' GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT id, date, category, type FROM expenses_and_income WHERE amount > 1000 AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM monthly_expenses;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM monthly_expenses;
SELECT * FROM monthly_income WHERE income_amount > 1000;
SELECT income_id, income_source FROM monthly_income ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM monthly_expenses WHERE expense_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM monthly_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM monthly_expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500;
SELECT income_source, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM monthly_income GROUP BY income_source;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM monthly_expenses WHERE expense_description LIKE '%food%';
SELECT * FROM monthly_income WHERE income_amount >= 2000 ORDER BY income_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT id, expense_name, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT month_year, total_income, total_expenses, savings_rate FROM cash_flow ORDER BY savings_rate DESC;
SELECT amount, date FROM income WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT expense_name, amount FROM expenses WHERE date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, expense_name, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM income WHERE income_source LIKE '%salary%' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT id, month_year, total_income, total_expenses, savings_rate FROM cash_flow WHERE month_year = '2022-03';
SELECT id, expense_name, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT income_source, amount, date FROM income WHERE date < '2022-04-01' AND amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT expense_category, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_id, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_category='Groceries';
SELECT * FROM income WHERE income_amount < 500 ORDER BY income_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT income_amount, income_source FROM income WHERE income_source='Salary';
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC, expense_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT expense_id, expense_category FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 AND expense_category = 'Groceries';
SELECT income_source, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM income GROUP BY income_source HAVING total_income > 5000 ORDER BY total_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM cash_flow WHERE transaction_type = 'Debit' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT savings_goal, savings_amount FROM savings WHERE savings_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY savings_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_date, expense_amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT income_source, income_amount FROM income WHERE income_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM cash_flow WHERE cash_in > cash_out;
SELECT analysis_date, cash_flow_id, savings_rate_id FROM analysis ORDER BY analysis_date;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC, expense_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT expense_category, AVG(expense_amount) AS average_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_category ORDER BY average_amount DESC;
SELECT income_source, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM income GROUP BY income_source HAVING total_income > 1000 ORDER BY total_income DESC;
SELECT analysis.analysis_id, cash_in, cash_out, savings_rate FROM cash_flow JOIN analysis ON cash_flow.cash_flow_id = analysis.cash_flow_id WHERE cash_in > cash_out ORDER BY analysis_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT expenses.expense_id, expenses.expense_date, savings_rate.savings_rate FROM expenses JOIN savings_rate ON expenses.expense_date = savings_rate.savings_rate_date ORDER BY expense_id DESC;
